title: Mindfulness : One minute meditation
details: ***UPDATE***New meditative soundtracks added.Thunderstorm, Approaching storm, Singing Bowl.**********************************************A minute is all it takes to bring ourselves back to our natural state of inner peace and well-being. Learn to relax, refocus and re-energize in just one minute with meditations. It is about becoming a powerful positive force in your own life. Many of us struggle to find even 1 minute of peace in our day, and this skill is for you.Practicing mindfulness improves both mental and physical health. Mindfulness involves both concentration (a form of meditation) and acceptance. Many people struggle with how to begin meditating and get the rewards of a more contemplative life, so this skill is the perfect way to start a meditation practice. You can change your life, and change the world... one minute at a time. Feeling frazzled ?? Nature can support you in settling down. The sounds of nature set a serene atmosphere for meditation, helping to quiet a busy mind and aid relaxation. You have to try it to believe it - just one moment of meditation can make a big difference. There are several different meditations available. You can ask for a specific meditation or you can ask Alexa to select random. Each of these one-minute meditations will play a related meditative soundtrack to help you tune out the world and focus on your breath.Here list of meditative soundtrack:THUNDERSTORMAPPROACHING STORMSINGING BOWL BIRD CHIRPINGWIND CHIMESRAINFLOWING WATERMAGIC FORESTOCEAN WAVESRAINFORESTRELAXATIONZEN STONESPlease leave a 5-star review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at tc.storyline@gmail.com. By leaving review you tell us that it's worth putting more time into development. Costs you nothing, and inspires further development.Sound credit : orangefreesounds

title: One Minute Meditation
details: Take a minute for yourself, you deserve it. 'Mindful Meditation' contains many meditations of varying style and length for those who are ready to move past this introduction to medtitation. https://www.amazon.com/Stoked-Skills-Mindful-Meditation/dp/B0784GXF2M/If you like this skill and find it to be a useful addition to your mindfulness practice we would really appreciate if you drop us a nice review! title: The Pronunciator
details: New Features!-----------------* You can continue building on a word after you have asked it to be pronounced.  Previously, the skill used to clear the word immediately after each pronunciation.* You can now clear the word you've been building at anytime by saying: "restart"* Although we still encourage that you spell each letter out one at a time, we recognize that sometimes you may not have the time to do that.  Thus, we've added a method for you to get a "speed pronunciation".  Just say the word "say" followed by all of the letters!Just spell the word out and let Alexa tell you how it's pronounced!  Simple as that!Works for words and non-words alike.  If it isn't a word, Alexa will do its best to pronounce it.  The skill works as follows:* When prompted, speak each letter slowly to maximize the chances of Alexa understanding the letter.* Wait for Alexa to repeat the letter before proceeding.  There is a small chance Alexa might misunderstand.Another reason for not having the user spell out all of the letters at once is to respect the 8 second timeout that Alexa has on responses.  If the word is too long, or if the letters are spoken too slowly, there is a very good chance that that timeout will occur.  By speaking one letter at a time, we hope to reduce such a likelihood.* When you are finished, just say, "done"If you are in a rush and don't have the time to have Alexa recognize each letter that you say, you can get the skill to do a "speed pronunciation".  Just say the word "say" followed by all of the letters.  Do keep in mind though that there is a higher chance that Alexa will misunderstand some of the letters that you say.Here are some other useful commands:* restart - Tell Alexa to clear all of the letters and start once more with an empty word.* done - Tell Alexa to pronounce the word using the current letters spoken.* undo - Tell Alexa to undo the last letter spoken.  This is in case Alexa misunderstood the letter.If you enjoyed this skill and want to check out some of my other skills, feel free to checkout my website here:https://alexa-skill-dev.gitlab.io/alexaWebsite/

title: Back to the future trivia
details: This Skill is born from the passion for a masterpiece of science fiction of the years ... well of what year you should already know.The game will take place on 5 multiple choice questions, taken at random. The answers are also random, so every time you play, you will notice that there may be different answers to the same question since the last time you played. Thanks to this it will be very fun to play in a group with friends.Personally I was very influenced by this Back to the Future and especially by the figure of Dr. Brown. I still remember the first time I saw the first episode, "I saw it on a rerun". I remember it vividly: I got hit over the head, and when I came to, I had a revelation - a vision - to picture in my head. A picture of THIS ... (quoted obviously)In any case, I am very happy to share this passion with you all ... or maybe this obsession.The game is constantly developing and updating, I hope you will like it and let you discover many curiosities that you may not have known.Download it and rate it, let me know what you think, so that I can continue to enrich it with many other curiosities.P.s. About the utterance: Amazon don't allow the "TO" into the utterance of the skills. That's why the example above don't contains the correct title "Back TO the future trivia", anyway you can use the correct title to open this skill, because Alexa understand as well that you want use this skill. I hope that problem will solved in the future.*This skill is made for "passion purpose" only, without commercial purpose. Back to the Future™, Back to the Future™ Part II and Back to the Future™ Part III are registered trademarks and copyrights of Universal City Studios, Inc. and U-Drive Joint Venture

title: Unofficial Back To The Future Trivia
example.2: “Alexa, ask Back The Future Trivia to play like an expert”
example.3: “Alexa, ask Back The Future Trivia my leaderboard”
details: Great Scott!Do you think you are a real fan of the Back To The Future trilogy? This is the place for you. Welcome to the Unofficial Back To The Future Trivia. A simple but addictive trivia game of the most famous trilogy of all times. You can play the game in three different categories: Beginner, Fan and Expert, the difficulty of the questions will depend on the category you choose.How it works?Alexa will ask you multiple questions about the three movies, the difficulty of the questions will be given by the category you have chosen for the game. For each correct answer you get points, for each correct answer in the Beginner category you get 2 points, for each correct answer in the Fan category you get 3 points , for each correct answer in the Expert category you get 5 points.How can I answer the questions?Simple. You can answer the questions by saying the option you think is the correct one, something like: "option D" or "the first option" or "the last one".Alexa will accumulate each of the score you get in each game you play. You can ask Alexa your leaderboard to know which category you're a master. You can also ask Alexa for your score in some individual category, so you can know how many points you have achieved in that category in all your games.So, do you accept the challenge? Do you think you know more than Alexa about Doc Brown or Marty or Biff? Play this trivia an discover it by yourself.TIPS:- If you don't know the answer to a question, you can skip it by saying "skip" or "next".- You can say "repeat" to hear a question again.- You can say "help" in the middle of the game to know all available options in the game.FEEDBACK:If you like this game, please leave a review. If something is wrong or you've had a bad experience, please write us before leaving a negative review at law.vzmk@gmail.com, thank you!More questions added regularly!

title: Guitar Backing Tracks
example.2: “Alexa ask backing tracks for a blues track”
example.3: “Alexa ask backing tracks for track in the key of A Minor”
details: Finally! Alexa is ready to play backing tracks in every key and many styles while you rock out on lead guitar like the rockstar you really are!  Enjoy an track list of over 30 high quality backing tracks including blues, metal, jazz and moreHere's what you need to get started:"Alexa ask backing tracks to play a random track""Alexa ask backing tracks to play a blues/jazz/metal track""Alexa ask backing tracks to play a track in the key of A minor""Alexa ask backing tracks to play track number 5""Alexa ask backing tracks to list all the tracks""Alexa next"Alexa will keep your track looping so you can keep on rockin' to your heart's content with no interruptions. If you ever get bored of a track, just say "Alexa, next" and she will play you a random new track.NOTE: The way that Alexa handles audio skills will require you to always include the "Alexa ask backing tracks" part before your request while sound is playing. (unless you are saying pause, resume, or next).That's all there is to it! If you like this skill, a five star review is much appreciated. It will help encourage us to keep on developing new features and new skills and keep them free for you. Leave us any comments or suggests as well and feel free to message us at support@stokedskills.com. Rock on!Credit for these amazing tracks goes to MangoJamz! Check out the Mangojamz youtube channel or website for an even more great tracks.Website: http://mangojamz.com/Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBlSLyeXjHrlZQQwqA6OBPA

title: Backing Tracks
details: Are you tired of practicing your scales? Is it a pain to find the right backing track online? Are the other Backing Track Skills just not cutting it? Then this might be the right skill for you!Backing Tracks has more than 100 high quality tracks in 23 scales for you to choose from and jam out to. Just tell Alexa what key or song style you want to play in and she will take care of the rest. So what are you waiting for? Get your guitar out and start hitting those frets! Once you are done please leave an awesome rating and review below, we are always happy about feedback.All tracks in the skill were provided by the great ElevatedJamTracks and are available for download on https://elevatedjamtracks.bandcamp.com.

title: Tamil Verse
example.1: “Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me verse 5”
example.2: “Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me prologue 12”
example.3: “Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me something”
details: This skill help us to learn Thirukurral using english transliteration ie. We can request verse(kural) by number, ask skill to recite all verse(kural) in a prologue(athikaram or ask some random verse(kural). Commands are as below"Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me verse 5"- this will recite kural 5"Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me prologue 12"- this will recite all ten kural from athikaram 12"Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me something"- this will recite random kural with kural number"Alexa Help"-for help text"Alexa stop"=For stop the reciting"Alexa Open Tamil Verse" for welcome text and possible commandsupdated some of tamil phonetics and emphasis only on tamil wordsfor any update request please contact kramnewdev@gmail.comConsidered as chef d'oeuvre of both Indian and world literature,the Tirukkural is one of the most important works in the Tamil language. This is reflected in some of the other names by which the text is given by, such as Tamiḻ maṟai (Tamil veda), Poyyāmoḻi (words that never fail), and Deiva nūl (divine text).Translated into at least 40 languages as of 2014, Tirukkural is one of the most widely translated non-religious works in the world. The work is dated to sometime between the third and first centuries BCE and is considered to precede Silappatikaram (1st century CE) and Manimekalai (between 1st and 5th centuries CE), since they both acknowledge the Kural text. Because the life, culture and ethics of the Tamils are considered to be solely defined in terms of the values set by the Tirukkural, the government and the people of Tamil Nadu alike uphold the text with utmost reverence.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tirukkuṛaḷ

title: tamil verse
example.2: “Ask Tamil Verse to read verse five”
example.3: “Ask Tamil Verse to read about friendship”
details: This skill help you to learn Tirukkuṛaḷ, written by Thiruvalluvar consists of three books, the first book on Aram (the Way or Dharma or Virtues), the second on Porul (Material or Artha or Wealth) and the third on Inbam (Joy or Kama or Love).You can request for a kuṛaḷ(verse) by number, or ask for a random kuṛaḷ. If you have something specific in mind, you can search for virtues or wealth or love(different paals in Tirukkuṛaḷ)."Alexa Open Tamil Verse""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse to read verse five""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse about Army""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse to tell me about State""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse to tell me verse twelve""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse to tell me Chapter twelve""Read verse about friendship from Tamil Verse""Read about gratitude from Tamil Verse"In the next version, will add 'tamil audio' for the kurals and searches based on kural text.If you have any feedback, please add them in the review/comments of this app.Ref: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tirukkuṛaḷ

title: Trivia Daily
details: With this skill you can ask Alexa for a piece of trivia everyday. Ask Alexa to start "Trivia Daily" and say yes when the skill asks you if you want to hear a piece of trivia.

title: Trivia Daily
details: Get your daily brain workout and improve your trivia knowledge with Trivia Daily! Each day you will be asked 10 new quick-fire trivia quiz questions, can you get them all correct on your first try?-----------------------------------------Getting Started-----------------------------------------Simply enable the skill and say "Alexa, play trivia daily" and your quiz session will begin.-----------------------------------------In Game Commands-----------------------------------------When asked a question you can either answer the question, or say:Pass - To pass on a question you don't know.Repeat - To get alexa to repeat the question.-----------------------------------------Please Leave A Review-----------------------------------------Reviews help other users find and enable the skill, so if you like this skill please leave a review.If you have any questions, complaints or suggestions please drop me an E-mail at: quickfireskill@gmail.com and I will get back to you.

title: Jim Harold's Crime Scene
example.1: “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to play the newest episode”
example.2: “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to go back 5 episodes”
example.3: “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to fast forward 2 minutes”
details: Jim Harold interviews authors and experts on true crime cases. Past guests have included a Pulitzer Prize winner and Best Selling authors. Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be offered the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to skip forward and backward by entire episodes, and you can also fast forward and rewind within episodes themselves. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes released; or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:**Skip Entire Episodes**— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa skip” or “Alexa tell Crime Scene to skip ahead 5 episodes”**Fast Forward/Back Within Episode**— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to fast forward 2 minutes”— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to rewind 45 seconds”**Select Newest Episode**— “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to play the newest episode”

title: Crime Scene
details: The crime rates in Alexton are increasing day by day and you are appointed as a police detective, who will be responsible to decrease those numbers! Hear murder mysteries, judge the alibis, inspect the crime scene, and at last guess the killer!The suspects will try to confuse you with their statements, but don't fall for their phony words!  Make powerful judgments, throw criminals behind the bars, and make Alexton crime-free again!If you do so, the senior officer will appreciate your work, but if you fail, (Beware) get prepared to get a scolding.

title: Hello Kitty Fan Trivia Game
details: A simple trivia game to test your knowledge about Hello Kitty. Start the game by saying "Alexa Start Kitty Trivia". The trivia will give you multiple choice answers. Reply with the number of the correct answer. E.g.Alexa: "What is the color of Hello Kitty's hair bow? 1 : Red, 2: Pink,  3: Blue, 4: Yellow"User: "1"Alexa: "Correct. Your score is 2"Note: This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Hello Kitty. It is an unofficial (fan) version.

title: Kitty Trivia

title: Spooky Tales
details: Spooky tales lets you listen to a quick horror tale. Some of these will make you think and some others can cause nightmares. So be prepared for the scares!How To UseThe skill is really easy to use. Just say "Alexa, open Spooky Tales." You will be asked if you'd like to listen to more tales after she tells you one. You can answer either with a "Yes" or a "No."
